Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.project

Class Build

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.project.Build
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Named
public class Build extends Object implements com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Named
Information about a build, from the resource classpath resource /build.properties. The build information for a project can be retrieved with build(Class), passing in any class in that project.

Build Date, Number and Name

The date that the build occurred in UTC time can be retrieved with buildJavaUtcDate(). A build number is the number of days since the start of the KivaKit epoch, December 5, 2020. There is only one build number per day (hour of day is not considered if there are multiple builds in the same day). The build number can be retrieved with buildNumber() and the build also has a human-memorable name() that is formed from the build number using combinations of adjectives and nouns, like "sparkling piglet". The build name will always be the same for a given build number or date.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
